phrases: Jellal's been brought back to life!
If you do not bring Wendy back soon, Erza's in real trouble!
Natsu, I will hold him here!
I heard ya the first time!
If it is love and dreams and you it will become magical.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
I kind of admired this powerful world,
Frozen time has started to move again
I do not need any complicated answers.
Simple feelings are the most important.
You can change those tears she would on sad nights into strength.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
Deep inside it, there is a single man.
Just rest there a little while.
Why the hell is he here?
I was getting worried after not being able to contact anyone.
One of the enemy has very good hearing.
It is possible he could intercept our conversation.
That is why I am speaking directly into your mind.
So, how are Wendy-chan and the cat?
They are here, although she is unconscious.
I am going to upload an app directly into your head that will guide you here.
The cat seems to have used too much magic and taken too much damage for me to connect...
Why have you been talking to yourself?
I do not really get it, but I have an apple in my head!
I totally know how to get to where Erza is!
It is like I have known all along!
I do not have any apples in my head!
So, how did you tell Natsu where we are?
My magic, Archive, can compress information.
By compressing it, people can transfer information between each other more quickly.
I have never heard of magic like that before.
Using magic to convert information into data is a recent concept, you see.
Anyway, thank goodness Wendy is safe.
Just wait a little longer, Erza.
I will protect you until Natsu comes back.
What are you smiling about at a time like this?
I did not mean to offend you.
Gray is confronting one of Oracion Seis, codenamed Racer.
You have stopped me twice now.
At this rate, my name will mean dirt.
If I felt like it, it would not be any trouble to catch up with those brats.
But I will not feel satisfied until you are history.
I will have plenty of time to catch up afterwards.
I do not think so, buddy!
I cannot follow him with my eyes!
Even if you used up your magic power making this ice wall,
I hope you do not expect me to go easy on you.
Come at me as fast as you can!
What kind of noise is this?
You expect me to ride one of these things?!
These are machines made to match my own speed.
Thanks for equipping them with SE plugs!
In this world, there are many vehicles which use magical power as energy.
Among them, the magic four-wheelers and magic motorcycles are equipped with SE Plugs
in order to send magic power from the driver directly to the internal engine.
It is definitely tough to make sure I do not lose all my magic power with these things.
I do not got a choice.
You are challenging me to a race?
There are not no rules, so you would better be prepared!
You have got some nice style for being a goody-two-shoes from an official guild!
Damn it, it is hard to aim!
Do you really have the speed to pass me?
But the Dead Grand Prix has just gotten started!
What is the matter, hot stuff?
I wonder what the explosion was just now?
What other choice do I have?
I cannot use magic well while I am drivin' this thing.
Well, you just watch real carefully.
I will show you how creation magic is done!
Put your money where your mouth is!
You still use both hands when you use creation magic?
It is how Ul taught us, right?
That is some speedy creation magic you have there.
But you are not there yet!
You just cannot catch up to my speed.
He is at 4 of the clock!
If you concentrate, you can follow anyone!
Fire on my mark, and do not hold back!
Why did he take off his clothes?
He is sped up even faster!
You will never hit me with those attacks.
No one can keep up with my speed.
Is this what Oracion Seis really is?
Now, I need to get around to finishing you off,
The results of the investigation are in.
It is possible that Brain was once part of the Bureau of Magic.
Then, what is his true identity?
What worries me is the R-system, in other words, the Tower of Heaven.
This seems to have something to do with it.
I have got reports indicating that.
There is a connection to Jellal...
That is what you mean, right?
What is Brain trying to accomplish with magic?
Natsu and the others are on the scene.
So, I am sure things will be fine.
It would be nice if they do not destroy things any more than necessary, though...
That is what you are worried about?
What could he be talking about?
Do not give me this crap!
Just stay up there and watch, Gray!
Please, do not get me wrong.
We just happened to have the same teacher.
Scale will be bagging this one!
That overconfidence is not going to help your chances.
Well, your chances were zero to begin with anyway...
Nice power, but it lacks speed!
You cannot catch me with magic like that!
Then how about this, I wonder?
What are you, slow in the head?
You are the one that is slow in the head!
Your weak point is the weakness of your attacks!
No matter how fast you are, you cannot seal the deal!
Close in on me, and you are shish kebab...
Come at me with that speed you are so proud of!
Now that was my top speed.
You think I would be serious at first against weaker opponents like you?
Where do you think you are going?
What happened to that momentum you had at first?
Do not you understand that you cannot hit me?
You think you can stop me with that, huh?
You said that I do not have any way to seal the deal with you.
As long as I have the speed, I can get you first, before you have a chance to use magic.
Well, there is nothing wrong with being a bit arrogant when you are young.
But you were up against the wrong dude.
I am one of Oracion Seis.
Six Pillars that will never crumble.
Only death awaits those who rock the pillars.
When I saw the birds flying by so fast in the sky, I figured out how your magic really works.
Your magic does not increase your own speed.
It lowers the speed of your opponents...
Or more accurately, it slows down their sense of time in a certain area.
In other words, you slow me down.
And since the magic only affects a certain area,
when someone sees you from outside your range...
They can take away your speed!
That is why you had me get so far away from him?
There is no way he will hit!
It does not matter how far away he is!
Because there is nothing stronger than a member of Fairy Tail
and the strength of their passion!!
We still got five more of these guys.
I actually thought you two were fighting back there!
I would expect nothing less from the older pupil.
Do not make fun of me.
I swear on the name Oracion Seis, if I go down in defeat, I will take you with me!
Why do I have to run out of magic power now?
The things I do for you, younger pupil...
One corner of the Six Generals has broken?
I never thought I would have to wake him up...
Get rid of every last one of them.
I sure wish I could breathe fire...
What is this all of a sudden?
Because I could fry fish, or light up dark places...
Then why do not you try eating my flames?
It might let you use breath attacks!
Cats are not good with hot food, so I will pass.
There is at least a chance, right?
